## Load libraries

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

## Data summary

```{r}
summary(Orange)
```

## Visualize data

```{r, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(
    Orange,
    aes(
        x = age,
        y = circumference,
        colour = Tree
    )
) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_line() +
    guides(colour = FALSE) +
    theme_bw()
```
